item.title: [snc] Citizen's Crowbar
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

When Citizen's Crowbar enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green and white Citizen creature token, then attach Citizen's Crowbar to it.

Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has "{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Citizen's Crowbar: Destroy target artifact or enchantment."

Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

https://www.facebook.com/dragonslairsalisbury/posts/pfbid02gBvBs2T7eF43Cud2df7wxAitBcP1kBrSDsVWZJkEM5uLvJopG8pjupJfRUaRcdRol

item.title: [snc] Whack
item.description:
Sorcery

This spell costs {3} less to cast if it targets a white creature.

Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.

https://www.facebook.com/dragonslairsalisbury/posts/pfbid02gBvBs2T7eF43Cud2df7wxAitBcP1kBrSDsVWZJkEM5uLvJopG8pjupJfRUaRcdRol

item.title: [snc] Deal Gone Bad
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. Target player mills three cards. (They put the top three cards of their library into their graveyard.)

https://aksiz.com/202269354/

item.title: [snc] Jetmir's Fixer
item.description:
Creature — Cat Warrior

{R}{G}: Jetmir's Fixer gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If mana from a Treasure was spent to activate this ability, put a +1/+1 counter on Jetmir's Fixer instead.

https://www.facebook.com/SpiritChannell/photos/a.105094344561838/522127832858485/

item.title: [snc] Slip Out the Back
item.description:
Instant

Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. It phases out. (Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until your next turn.)

https://www.facebook.com/OutpostGhent/posts/2150191685146473

item.title: [snc] "Supportive BFF"
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

"Supportive BFF" enters the battlefield with a shield counter on it. (If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)

Whenever "Supportive BFF" attacks, up to one other target creature gains flying until end of turn.

https://twitter.com/oh_joohyun/status/1514534364125999106

item.title: [snc] Cabaretti Initiate
item.description:
Creature — Raccoon Citizen

{2}{R/W}: Cabaretti Initiate gains double strike until end of turn.

https://www.ungeek.ph/2022/04/magic-the-gathering-streets-of-new-capenna-card-preview-cabaretti-initiate/

item.title: [snc] Big Score
item.description:
Instant

As an additional cost to cast this spell, draw a card.

Draw two tokens and create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

https://nextrift.com/exclusive-mtg-streets-of-new-capenna-card-preview-big-score/

item.title: [snc] Hold for Ransom
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature can't attack or block and has "{7}: Hold for Ransom's controller sacrifices it and draws a card. Activate only as a sorcery."

https://twitter.com/YahooEsportsSEA/status/1514136309899542529

item.title: [snc] Plasma Jockey
item.description:
Creature — Viashino Warrior

Whenever Plasma Jockey attacks, target creature an opponent controls can't block this turn.

Blitz {2}{R} (If you cast this spell for its blitz cost, it gains haste and "When this creature dies, draw a card." Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

Creature — Ogre Warrior

Whenever "First-Round Pugilist" attacks, create a tapped and attacking 1/1 red Devil creature token with "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."

Blitz {3}{R} (If you cast this spell for its blitz cost, it gains haste and "When this creature dies, draw a card." Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

item.title: [snc] "Cleanup Crew"
item.description:
Creature — Human Citizen

When "Cleanup Crew" enters the battlefield, choose one —

• Destroy target artifact.

• Destroy target enchantment.

• Exile target card from a graveyard.

• You gain 4 life.

https://www.eurogamer.es/desvelamos-en-exclusiva-dos-cartas-de-streets-of-new-capenna-la-nueva-expansion-de-magic-the-gathering

item.title: [snc] "Cement Shoes"
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +3/+3 and has "At the beginning of your end step, tap this creature."

Equipped creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

https://www.eurogamer.es/desvelamos-en-exclusiva-dos-cartas-de-streets-of-new-capenna-la-nueva-expansion-de-magic-the-gathering

item.title: [snc] Widespread Thievery
item.description:
Enchantment

Hideaway 5 (When this enchantment enters the battlefield, look at the top five cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)

Whenever you cast a multicored spell, create a Treasure token. Then, you may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}. If you do, you may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lRcRQ-RqbAU

item.title: [snc] "Corpse Explosion"
item.description:
Sorcery

As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile a creature card from your graveyard.

"Corpse Explosion" deals damage equal to the exiled card's power to each creature and each planeswalker.

https://dorasuta.jp/column/detail?aid=10309

item.title: [snc] Raffine's Silencer
item.description:
Creature — Human Assassin

When Raffine's Silencer enters the battlefield, it connives. (Draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

When Raffine's Silencer dies, target creature an opponent controls gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is Raffine's Silencer's power.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1454391961?t=01h30m40s

Whenever Civil Servant attacks, you may tap another untapped Citizen you control. If you do, Civil Servant gets +1/+0 and gains lifelink until end of turn.

item.title: [snc] Glittering Stockpile
item.description:
Artifact — Treasure

{T}: Add {R}. Put a stash counter on Glittering Stockpile.

{T}, Sacrifice Glittering Stockpile: Add X mana of any one color, where X is the number of stash counters on Glittering Stockpile.

item.title: [snc] "Butter Passer"
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control two or more multicolored creatures, "Butter Passer" gains double strike until end of turn.

item.description:
Sorcery

item.title: [ncc] Henzie "Toolbox" Torre
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Devil Rogue

Each creature you cast with mana value 4 or greater has blitz. The blitz cost is equal to its mana cost. (You may choose to cast that spell for its blitz cost. If you do it gains haste and "When this creature dies, draw a card." Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

Blitz costs you pay cost {1} less for each time you've cast your commander from the command zone this game.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-image-gallery/streets-of-new-capenna-commander

item.title: [snc] Ziatora's Envoy
item.description:
Creature — Viashino Warrior

Trample

Whenever Ziatora's Envoy deals combat damage to a player, look at the top card of your library. You may play a land from the top of your library or cast a spell with mana value less than or equal to the damage dealt from the top of your library without paying its mana cost. If you don't, put that card into your hand.

Blitz {2}{B}{R}{G}

https://screenrant.com/mtg-streets-new-capenna-preview-ziatoras-envoy-jund-riveteers/

item.title: [ncc] Boxing Ring
item.description:
Artifact

Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, it fights up to one target creature you don't control with the same mana value.

{T}: Create a Treasure token. Activate only if you control a creature that fought this turn.

item.title: [ncc] Mari, the Killing Quill
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Vampire Assassin

Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, exile it with a hit counter on it.

Assassins, Mercenaries, and Rogues you control have deathtouch and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may remove a hit counter from a card that player owns in exile. If you do, draw a card and create two Treasure tokens."

item.description:

Haste

{T}: Target opponent creates X Treasure tokens, where X is the number of Treasure tokens you created this turn.

item.title: [snc] Scheming Fence
item.description:
Creature — Human Citizen

As Scheming Fence enters the battlefield, choose a nonland permanent.

Activated abilities of the chosen permanent can't be activated.

Scheming Fence has all activated abilities of the chosen permanent except loyalty abilities. You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to activate them.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1ydLzF6QGbs
